docs.lead_paragraph: We give another chapter, or rather a series of chapters, this morning, containing more of the fearful riots at Staten Island, and the total destruction of the public property and hospitals at the Quarantine grounds, by the demented people of Richmond County.

docs.snippet: JAMES H. WELSH and AZARIAH D. BARBOUR were last night elected Delegates to the Republican State Convention from the First Assembly District, composed of the First, Second, Third, and a portion of the Fourth and Sixth Wards.
docs.lead_paragraph: JAMES H. WELSH and AZARIAH D. BARBOUR were last night elected Delegates to the Republican State Convention from the First Assembly District, composed of the First, Second, Third, and a portion of the Fourth and Sixth Wards.

headline.main: WASHINGTON.; The Telegraph Celebration--Amog Kendall--Return of Secretaries Toucey and Cann--Douglas' Ottawa Speech--Colonel For-key, &c., &c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The people of Washington are not inclined to celebrate the success of the Atlantic Telegraph by bonfires, illuminations and the firing of guapowder. Indeed, they do not rejoice over the event at all, so far as I can discover. Possibly they agree with the one idead H. C. CAREY, in thinking that the submarine cable will strengthen the Free-traders and strike deadly blow at the Protectionists.

docs.lead_paragraph: TeMPEINSVILLE. S. I., Friday-3 1/2 o'clock A. M. At the close of my midnight dispatch the flames were just bursting out in the large Women's Hospital the only building left from the conflagration of yes. terday, which was adapted for the accommodation of the risk, While I write its walls are falling In, and the whole structure is a mass of ruins. docs.snippet: The great Quarantine question has at last culminated. The dissatisfaction of the Staten Islanders has terminated in an eruption. The Quarantine buildings, or at least the greater part of them, are no more. They were destroyed on Wednesday night by a...

headline.main: THE STATEN ISLAND ARSON.; Meeting of the Conspirators Last Night. ARRIVAL OF THE U. S. MARINES ON THE GROUND. All the Other Buildings to be Burned. THE UNSHELTERED SICK. Full Details of the Burning of the Quarantine Buildings. BOASTS OF THE INCENDIARIES.

docs.lead_paragraph: The great Quarantine question has at last culminated. The dissatisfaction of the Staten Islanders has terminated in an eruption. The Quarantine buildings, or at least the greater part of them, are no more. They were destroyed on Wednesday night by a mob of from 30 to 40 persons, and in our yesterday's edition we were enabled to state the facts pretty fully and accurately.
